channel.title: Qt wallet update
channel.description:
My system has the following specifications
QT Wallet, Client Wallet (and version) or Web wallet: Latest 64 bit QT Wallet Operating System and version: win 10 64bit If web wallet browser name and version: If desktop wallet (Qt or Client) block # of your client and # of connections:
The problem I am having is i tried update my wallet following the procedure but i'm stuck at this point, shown in the image. [https://ibb.co/rxMpPkM](https://ibb.co/rxMpPkM)
Wallet can't start at all, crashes while loading block index (checkpoint:2450000)
Any help?Thanks.
